verses.name: Genesis 24:16
verses.text: And the damsel was very fair to look upon, a virgin, neither had any man known her: and she went down to the well, and filled her pitcher, and came up.

verses.name: Genesis 24:17
verses.text: And the servant ran to meet her, and said, Let me, I pray thee, drink a little water of thy pitcher.

verses.name: Genesis 24:18
verses.text: And she said, Drink, my lord: and she hasted, and let down her pitcher upon her hand, and gave him drink.

verses.name: Genesis 24:19
verses.text: And when she had done giving him drink, she said, I will draw water for thy camels also, until they have done drinking.
